Workspace

The ProtDCal workspace consists of the program folders:

  • Datasets: Containing all the datasets in PDB or FASTA format.
  • Outputs: Containing the outputs files of the program (* _AA, * _Prot, etc.).
  • Projects: Containing all project files (*.proj, *.idl). .
  • Help: Containing all the documentation files about the program and descriptors.

ProtDCal Protein Descriptor Calculation
